main event: A UFO was observed in Newtown, Ohio on January 27, 1964, that looked like a bright Roman candle and appeared to fizzle before falling beyond the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 seconds., The object changed color to greenish-blue., The object was reported to be seen from multiple locations around Cincinnati., The sound described was like metal hitting metal., The object was suggested to be a meteor by military investigators.
witness description: Neil Tavistock, a 52-year-old male resident of Newtown, Ohio.
